skills.description: I am a great team player and also work well on my own; I am also a quick leaner ,I got a certificate in Graphic design at iampassion youth cafe

education.description: I attended Spine Road HIgh School, where at that time i was not that into anything IT related it was only after high school that i found IT to be really intresting.
After High school I then went off to do a year course for a Higher Certificate in IT at CPUT.
I am currently sudying at Life choices

projects.description: This is a e-commerce web page i made with java-script
This is a to-do list that i created
Here i built a temperature conver using java-script
Here i built a BMi calculator using java-script
Here i built a calculator using java-script
This is my first portfolio i made with Html, CSS and Bootstrap

testimonials.name: Mujahid
testimonials.description: Alonso a man that is always ready for battle. He does not coward away from a challenge. When every you need his assistance he will jump into action and help. There is many more things to say about Alonso and that is just he is a action taker not a by stander.

testimonials.name: Logan
testimonials.description: After working with Alonso for the past months I've come to notice that he is an great person with excellent work ethics. I worked with him on past projects and he has been a good team player.

testimonials.name: Amy
testimonials.description: I would highly recommend Alonso to anyone in need of a talented and dedicated web developer. He has strong attention to detail and ability to solve problems.

testimonials.name: Keeno
testimonials.description: Alonso is a hard-working individual with a passion for coding. I've seen his commitment first hand and it is an encouragement to everyone around him. He is a helpful person with an understanding of web development and all it's concepts. He is an individual you will be happy to have in your corner.

testimonials.name: Seth
testimonials.description: Alonso is dedicated, hard working and a team player. He works well his peers and performs well on his projects. He has a good understanding of web development and would be a valuable addition to any team that is lucky enough to have him.

testimonials.name: Jason
testimonials.description: Alonso is is seen as a very dedicated person, always ready to take on any challenge that is put in front of him. Always ready to lend a helping hand in class or the workplace. He is very resourceful and can figure almost any problem and he has shown this capability countless times in the workplace and projects that were handed to him.
